page.title: 01MEIFOD SCHOOL
page.content: Meifod School was built during the last war(39-45) and was opened in 1942 by Mr. Clement Davies th well known Liberal M.P. that lived locally. The school is situated in a spacious and well designed campus,sited between the lower part of the village and the private and council estates to the North. It is sited in the broad valley of Meifod and is overlooked by the Dyffryn Hill and the higher escarpment between the valley and Llanfyllin. The general area is one of exceptional beauty on the A495 between Oswestry and the Cardiganshire Coast. It holds, at the moment, some 55 pupils and these children are taught by the Headteacher, Mr. D. Gareth Jenkins and Mrs. Delyth A. Evans, Infant Mistress.
